thread.title: Man, 31, found dead in bathroom of Manhattan apartment
thread.title_full: Man, 31, found dead in bathroom of Manhattan apartment

author: AIDAN McLAUGHLIN
title: Man, 31, found dead in bathroom of Manhattan apartment
text:
Man, 31, found dead in bathroom of Manhattan apartment Man, 31, found dead in bathroom of Manhattan apartment The man was found in an apartment on Ludlow St. near Rivington St. late Friday, officials said. (Google Maps Street View) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Saturday, February 25, 2017, 6:11 AM 
Police found a 31-year-old man dead inside a Lower East Side apartment Friday night, cops said. 
Officers responding to a 911 call found the man unresponsive inside the bathroom of an apartment on Ludlow St. near Rivington St. just after 11 p.m., police said. 
The man, who has not been identified, died at the scene, according to officials. 
The city medical examiner's office will determine his cause of death. Join the Conversation:
